summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3281 for the improvement of 26th Avenue Northwest, from West 65th Street to West 67th Street, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 40751, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
